analysis: The project currently has a basic HTML structure with some CSS and JavaScript files. The event specifies a theme about black holes with animated objects, slides, and pages. The current files need to be updated to reflect this theme with cosmic visuals, animations, and interactive elements.

improvements.description: Add sections for black hole information, animated slides, and interactive elements. Include a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon.
Complete the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Use Egyptian-themed color palette and UI elements.
Update the JavaScript file to include event handlers for the new buttons, mobile menu toggle functionality, and animations for black hole visuals and interactive elements.
